text: I know that the current game of football is known as gridiron football. Do you play?
No, but my nephew does.  Gridiron is an American sport played with a round ball.  Have you ever played?
I have not played the game before, but I love watching it! How long have you been playing?
Since I was a kid.  My grandpa used to play and taught me.  I love the tackle and that is the most important part of the game.
Do you have any other hobbies besides football?  I like to go to rock concerts.
I enjoy camping.  It is nice to get away from the city for a while.
I have never camped! I do not have a lot of time to do much of anything these days.
Do you live in the city or a rural area?  That makes a difference in the amount of time you have available.
I live in a city. The nearest big city is about 2 hours away.  How about you?
I live about 20 minutes from a major city.  Not too close, but not too far either.
I do. I have 2 boys and 3 girls. How about you? Do you have any kids?
I do! I have 3 boys. I never thought I'd have any of my own, but I love them so much. How old are your kids?
13, 14, and 17. Do you get to spend a lot of time with your children?
Yes, I have a lot because I own my marketing consultancy business. What about you, do you also have kids?
I don't have any, but my husband is thinking of adopting so maybe some day! You have your own business?
No, not yet. But hopefully someday! If you do, be sure to follow your heart.
Thank you for the encouragement! What do you like to do for fun? Anything outdoors?
I love hiking! I also love the outdoor, especially in the fall. What's your favorite thing to do?
That sounds like fun! I love to watch nature documentaries! Do you like nature a lot?
I like nature documentarys, especially those about wildlife. What kind of foods do you enjoy?
All kinds of weird stuff. My cousin was weird to me. What about you?
I like weird stuff as well! What are some of your hobbies?  Mine are cheer leading and hanging out outside.
I'm not much of a social person, which is probably why I like to shop so much. Do you have any friends?
Yes. I've a lot of friends who are cheersleaders! Do you like shopping?
That's awesome! And I really like shopping! Shopping is so relaxing.  What kind do you like?
I like clothing, accessories, and furniture. Doctors always have great deals on those!
That's always a good thing. What type of furnishings do you tend to buy?
I like buying furnished stuff that is made from recycled material! What do you do for work?
That sounds really interesting. I work in a factory. How about you, do you work?
Yes, I work at a bakery as a baker. What do your coworkers do there?
It was.  The plumber came and fixed it.  It was traumatizing though!
I'm sure it was very scary. Glad you're ok. What do you do for work?
I have a real estate agency.  How about you?  You have a job?
Yes, I am a writter. Are you married? Do you have children?  I love it!
I have three children. They are great kids. How many do you have?  What kind of writer?
Fiction mostly.  Do you enjoy reading?  It is my passion.  What do your kids like?
They like to swim. I don't get much time to read anymore. What books do you like?
Mostly fiction.  My favorite book is "Cowboy" by David Mitchell.
I will have to look into that. Do you like the tv show?  it is based on the book.
I have heard a lot about it. Has it had good reviews? I'll have to check it out.
wow, that is quite a commitment. What team do you like the most?   I like the Packers.
I like them too. I am more of a Patriots fan, but Packer is cool too
I like Tom Brady too, he is a great QB.  I also like the Chicago Bears.
A lot of people like the Bears! They're my 2nd favorite team behind the Seattle Seahawks
Seattle is a good team.  They have won the NFL's most recent Super Bowl.
That's awesome. They've won 5 Super Bowls since they started playing in the Super Bowlient
Who is your favorite team?  How long have you been watching the NFL?  I've been following the Bengals since they were founded in 1961.
My favorite team is the Chiefs. I have been watching them since 2001. They are the best!
Awesome.  The Chief's are a great team. They have consistently been a powerhouse in the NFC.
They sure have! They are one of the best teams of the National Field Hockey League.
Yeah, I apologized and explained that it was a misunderstanding. I was more embarassed then anything.
I would be too, it's all part of life though. I'm sure they got over it.
It really is! What do you do for work? I just started working online. I love it.
I'm a publisher for a large newspaper company. What kind of online work are you doing?
I'm an editor at an online publishing company. It's a lot of fun. What do your parents do?
My dad is retired now, but he was a cop for 30 years. He was a good one.
That's awesome. It sounds like you have a great family life. Do you have any siblings?
I do! I've 2 brothers and one sister. What about you? . .
I've an older sister, and a younger brother. We get along well. How about you??
I do. My sister is a bit younger than me, but we get along as well. What else do you like to do?
Yes I do like novel. What do you like to read?  What is your favorite food?
I like Romance novels and history books. My favorite food is Italian!  What about you?
Mine is pasta! I'm a ballerina so I like to make it at home.
I love pasta too!  Do you have any hobbies?  I write.  It is a passion of mine.
That's great! What genre do you write? I love romance novel. Do you like watching movies?
I write supernatural fiction.  Yes, I love watching movies.  Do any favourites?
Yeah, I really love the movie Finding Nemo. Have you seen it? What else do you do for fun?
I have seen it a few times.  I also like cooking.  What do other people do for a living?
I enjoy cooking too. I am a freelance graphic designer. What about yourself?
I'm self employed in marketing.  How long have you been doing graphic work?
That's cool. I've never actually seen it, although I know a few of my friends are really into it.  What is your favorite episode?
My favorite episode of Star Treck is probably the first episode of "The Next Generation" I watched. It premiered in 1994.
I would say mine would be the 2009 film Star Treks: The Undiscovered Country.
I haven't seen that one, but the original series was great. I also like the reboot series Star TreK: Generation.
There have been many, many, different reboots of Star trek: Generations.  I think I've seen the first one.
Generation is probably my favorite Star Trex film. It was made by Gene Roddenberry.
The film stars Gene and James T. Kirk.  Those guys were great.  Have you seen any of the movies?
I have seen a few. Toy Story and Jurassic Park are two of my favorites.
Those are great as well.  It's amazing to think that all of those movies came out in 1995.
I know, and they were all directed by Michael Bay.  He is an amazing director.
That would be fun.  I would love to visit there someday.  Do you travel often?
I do. I like to take long walks on the beach. Mexico is beautiful. I recommend visiting!
I would definitely like to visit.  Have you ever been to Ecuador?  I hear it's quite beautiful too.
No, I haven't but it is on my bucket list! I'm sure it is beautiful, especially with all the wonderful landscape there.
It sure sounds great!  I hope you're able to make your bucketlist happen.  :)
I sure hope so too! Thanks so much for being so nice to chat with me. Have a great day!
You as well!  Thanks for the chat.  Enjoy the rest of your day.  :D
Thank you so much! I really appreciate it! Have a good day! :) Bye! :)
You aswell!  Have a nice day. :D Bye.  ;)  XD
Hahaha! Hope you have a great rest of the day! See ya! :) Have a wonderful day!
Oh man.  I'm so sorry.  My condolences.  Do you have any other pets?
My other cat is black and white like my dogs.  What about you?  What do you have?
I don't have any pets but I'd love to have a dog. What do your pets like to eat?
My pets eat mostly lettuce and veggies.  They are a big help when I go to comedic clubs.
That's very interesting.  Are comedians your favorite comedians?  Are you a comedian yourself?
Yes, I do comedy.  Comedians are my favorite.  Who's yours?
I love Carrey and Amy Poehler the most.  Have you heard any of their material?
No I haven't. What kind of comedy is that? Is it just stand up or is it other types?
Stand up.  It's a comedy television show.  If you liked it, you should check it out.
I might check it on Netflix. Thanks for the suggestion! What else do you like to do for fun?
Wow that's so cool. Do you read a lot? I'm a big reader myself.
Yeah, I love to read. I love fantasy novels, especially Harry Potter. What do you read?
I love romance novels. I also like fantasy. My favorite book is Middles Ex. What's yours?
Romance and fantasy are fun too. My favorites are Harry Pottery and Game of Thrones.
Yes, I also enjoy Game of thrones. Have you read the books? I am reading them again right now.
No I haven't. I watched the show though and loved it. What other shows do you enjoy?
Breaking Bad is pretty good too. It is one of the most popular shows on TV. What about you?
I like the big bang theory. I watch it every sunday. It's one of my favorites.
I've never watched it. I have heard a lot about it though. Is it like a typical sitcom?
I guess you could consider it a sitcom. It was created by Adam Levine and Stephen Hillenburg.
I love watching food network! It's my favorite too. What's your favorite show on there?
i like to watch cooking shows . like food network . what about you ? what shows do you like?
Oh, that's awesome! I love to watch Chopped. Do you have a favorite?
i love chopped as well . my wife and i love to binge watch those shows .
That's so funny. What do you and your wife do for fun? Are you in school?
yes we are , working towards getting a bachelors in business administration.  what about yourself?
I'm doing just fine. My major is in business. What would you like to do with your degree?
I would love to get my bachelor's in accounting.  I am currently a waitress, but I'd like to be a manager.  What do people do for a living?
I have a part time job as well. I'm a teacher. How long have you been working as a waiter?
a little over 10 years.  How long did you work as teacher?  i've always admired teachers
For about 2 years! I've been spending a lot more time with him lately, though. He's a little intimidated by some of the stuff I'm teaching him.
That's awesome, I hope he continues to do well. What kind of dog is he?
He's an Australian Shepherd. What is your dog's name?  How old is he/she?
My dog is named Bella, she's a golden retriever. I've never had a dog in my life!
I've always wanted a golden! They're such sweethearts! I'm happy for you!
Thanks! They really are. They're one of the most loyal breeds. What other dogs have you owned?
I've had a few other small dogs. My favorite is a Border Collie.  do you have any other pets?
I've a chihuahua. I got him because my boyfriend loves puppies, haha.
I love Chihuhuas! They have such unique personalities! How old are the puppers?
They are both 4. Do you have a specific breed of dog?  Dogs are my favorite.
That sounds like a lotta fun. Do you have any favorite cartoons?   I really love Hanna-barbera.
That's one of my favorites! I was addicted to my little Pony when I was a kid, and I think I still am.
I like to watch Hanna Barbera cartoones when I eat my favorite food, pizza!
I love pizza! My friends and I like eating pizza while we play video games. Have you played any online games?
I've played a little Starcraft. I like MMO games. What kind of games do you play?
I play MMOs too! My favorite is Diablo 3. My friends don't really play any other games, though.
I've never played Diabolo 3. What is your favorite part of playing it?
My favorite part is the story and I love how much action there is in the game!  What is yours?
My favorite thing about Diablo is the multiplayer. I play it with a group of friends online. It is pretty fun.
That's great! What kind if games do your friends play? What is a multiplayer online game?
That is interesting, do you have any hobbies? I like collecting vintages.
I sell insurance for a living. What is your favorite vintage?  Blue is my favorite too
I like blue as well. Do you own a car or have one that is blue?
I don't own one, but I do like to borrow cars from friends and family occasionally.
What kind of cars do you like to work with?  I work on classic cars.  It's a lot of fun.
I don think I've ever borrowed a car. I've always wanted to, though.
Do you have a favorite color?  Mine is blue.  Blue has always been one of my favorite colors.
Mine too.  What do you do for a job? I work at a movie theater.
I'm a financial analyst. How long have you been working there? I've been working for a few years now.
I've only been working here for a couple of years. How do you enjoy finance? I imagine it requires a lot more study.
That is very cool.  I would be really scared to be in a self driving one.  What do you do for a living?
I work in marketing. How about you? What kind of career path do you have?
I'm a graphic designer, but I'd love to work on self-driving cars.
Oh, wow! That sounds cool. I'm not familiar with designing cars, but it sounds like you would have an interesting job.
Yes, that's why I chose to become a graphical designer.  It seems like an easy and lucrative career.
That's good. Are you into graphic arts in general? Is graphic art your passion?
No, I'm actually not too into it.  But I can see how it could be a fun hobby to share.  You?
I love it! I particularly love graphic novels, since they involve different forms of visual art such as animation, photography, computer graphics, illustration, etc.
I guess I should check out some of those types of graphic books.  Are there any good ones you'd recommend?
I've only recently started reading this genre, so I'm only beginning to get into it, but the best ones are DC and Marvel for sure.
Wow, that's impressive. I read a lot of romance books when I work at the grocery. Do you like reading books?
I do, I like crime fiction and historical fiction. What about you?
I also like crime books. They are a lot more interesting than typical romance. What's your favorite crime book?
A little secret, but my favorite is "The Berenstain Bears" - it's a mystery.
I love mysteries! My dad used to read those to me when I was a kid.
That's awesome! They're so interesting, and unique because they usually deal with the supernatural.
What else do you do for fun? I'm a very social person, so I like to hang out with friends and play sports.
I love to read, and I also play the drums. What kind of sports do you play?
I play soccer. I'm in a very competitive league, and we practice 5 days a week.
That's a lot! How long have you been playing?  I know my mom's been playing for 30 years.
i am sorry to hear that. do you have any hobbies?  what are some of your hobbies
I like to play video games and watch movies. What about you? Are you busy with school or work?
yes, I work part time at a cafeteria and school part time. what about you
I am a full time student as well. How long have you been working at the cafetia?
three years. what is your major? I'm studying education.   What are you studying?
It is a bachelor's degree in education. what kind of work do you do?
I work as a financial analyst. What do you want to do once you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. Financial Analyst sounds interesting though. What kind of hours do you work?
I work every day as a realtor. I love it. what do you like to do?
I like painting. It is relaxing. Do you have hobbies or do you stay at home?
Maybe one day you could overcome that fear. What kind of projects do you have in front?
I am currently working as an accountant.how about you?.What kind of hobbies do you enjoy?
I like fishing and making boats. What do you do for a living?  What do your family do?
I am an accounting assistant, but I am looking for a new job. My family is very spread out. How about yours?
My family lives near me, but have moved a few times. I don't have a lot of family anymore.
I am sorry to hear that. I do not think I could handle moving all the time. Do you have any siblings?
No, I am the only one. My sibling had a rough childhood.  How about you, do you?
I'm an only child, as well. But I hope to adopt an older brother or sister some day.
That is so nice of you to want to help the less fortunate! What kind if job are you looking for?
I'd like to be a lawyer. What about you. Do YOU have any hobbies?
What type of job are you applying for? What do you do for a living?
I applied for a lawyer position. I will be a paralegal. I would love to be a lawyer. What kind of job do you want?
I want to be an accountant. What made you want to become a paralgal?
Well, my parents were both lawyers, and so they got me into the field. What do your parents do?
My parents are not very close. They were both military, so they were always busy.
Well, I hope your parents can get closer to you someday. What is your favorite holiday? Mine is Christmas.
I love Halloween! Hallowe'en is my favorite holidays!  Do you like halloween?
Yes! I love going trick or treating in my neighborhood. Do you have any kids? .
No, I don't have any children. I do not know if I'm ready for kids.
I think you will be, if you love kids and want them.  What else do you like to do in your spare time?
